filmography.title: The Most Dangerous Game
filmography.role_description: A famous big-game hunter who becomes the prey after being shipwrecked on an island owned by a mad count who hunts humans for sport.
filmography.plot: A big game hunter falls off a yacht and swims to an isolated island, where he is hunted by a Russian aristocrat.

filmography.title: Bird of Paradise
filmography.role_description: An American sailor who falls in love with a Polynesian princess, risking the wrath of her people and their volcano god.
filmography.plot: A sailor falls for a native girl on a South Seas island, but their romance is threatened when she is chosen to be sacrificed to a volcano.

filmography.title: Bed of Roses
filmography.role_description: A tough but kind riverboat captain who falls for a woman with a checkered past, unaware she stole from him.
filmography.plot: A reform school girl released from prison decides to rob a riverboat captain but ends up falling in love with him.

filmography.title: Gambling Lady
filmography.role_description: A wealthy society man who falls in love with an honest professional gambler, defying his family's expectations.
filmography.plot: The daughter of an honest gambler follows in his footsteps and marries a wealthy man, but gets caught up in a murder scandal.

filmography.title: The Richest Girl in the World
filmography.role_description: A man who falls in love with the world's wealthiest woman, unaware of her true identity as she tests his sincerity.
filmography.plot: The world's richest woman switches places with her secretary to find a man who will love her for herself, not her money.

filmography.title: Private Worlds
filmography.role_description: A progressive doctor at a mental hospital who struggles with the new female superintendent's methods and his own marriage.
filmography.plot: The staff of a mental hospital deal with their own personal demons while treating patients.

filmography.title: Barbary Coast
filmography.role_description: A poetic prospector who arrives in San Francisco and loses his gold but fights to save the woman he loves from a crime boss.
filmography.plot: A woman arrives in San Francisco during the Gold Rush to marry a rich miner, only to find he has been murdered.

filmography.title: These Three
filmography.role_description: A doctor whose engagement and career are destroyed by a malicious lie spread by a student at his fiancée's school.
filmography.plot: Two schoolteachers and the man they both love face ruin when a malicious student cooks up a lie about their relationship.

filmography.title: Come and Get It
filmography.role_description: The son of a lumber tycoon who falls in love with the daughter of the woman his father once loved, creating a rivalry.
filmography.plot: A ruthless lumber tycoon abandons a saloon singer for a socialite, only to later fall for his former lover's daughter.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Supporting Actor (Walter Brennan)

filmography.title: Adventure in Manhattan
filmography.role_description: A crime reporter and criminologist who predicts a jewel theft and tries to catch the mastermind while romancing an actress.
filmography.plot: A reporter predicts a crime and tries to catch the crook, but his arrogance nearly costs him his life and his girl.

filmography.title: Internes Can't Take Money
filmography.role_description: An idealistic intern who helps a widow find her missing child while navigating the ethical dilemmas of his profession; the first screen Dr. Kildare.
filmography.plot: Dr. Kildare helps an ex-convict mother find her missing daughter with the help of a gangster he treated.

filmography.title: Dead End
filmography.role_description: A struggling architect who tries to escape the slums and save a local gang of kids from the influence of a returning gangster.
filmography.plot: The lives of a gang of street urchins, a struggling architect, and a returning gangster intersect in the New York City slums.

filmography.title: Wells Fargo
filmography.role_description: A dedicated pioneer who helps build the Wells Fargo empire, sacrificing his family life for the expansion of the West.
filmography.plot: A history of the Wells Fargo company, focusing on a man who dedicates his life to its success at the cost of his marriage.

filmography.title: Union Pacific
filmography.role_description: A troubleshooter for the Union Pacific Railroad who fights saboteurs and corruption to ensure the tracks get laid.
filmography.plot: A railroad troubleshooter fights corrupt politicians and gamblers trying to stop the construction of the Union Pacific Railroad.

filmography.title: Primrose Path
filmography.role_description: A working-class man who marries a girl from a 'bad family' and struggles to accept her background.
filmography.plot: A girl from a shanty town marries a respectable man but hides her family's background of prostitution and poverty.

filmography.title: Foreign Correspondent
filmography.role_description: An American crime reporter sent to Europe who uncovers a massive spy ring on the eve of World War II.
filmography.plot: An American reporter tries to expose enemy spies in London who are involved in a fictional continent-wide conspiracy.

filmography.title: Sullivan's Travels
filmography.role_description: A successful comedy director who disguises himself as a hobo to learn about suffering for a serious film, only to discover the value of laughter.
filmography.plot: A Hollywood director goes undercover as a tramp to experience life's hardships for a serious film project, but learns comedy is more valuable.

filmography.title: The Palm Beach Story
filmography.role_description: A struggling inventor whose wife leaves him to find a rich husband who can finance his ideas, leading to a chaotic chase to Florida.
filmography.plot: A wife decides to divorce her husband and marry a millionaire to fund his inventions, but he follows her to stop it.

filmography.title: The More the Merrier
filmography.role_description: A soldier awaiting deployment who rents half of a woman's apartment in crowded wartime Washington, D.C., leading to romance.
filmography.plot: During the WWII housing shortage in Washington D.C., a woman rents her apartment to two men, and the older one plays matchmaker.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Supporting Actor (Charles Coburn); Oscar: Nomination – Best Picture

filmography.title: Buffalo Bill
filmography.role_description: The legendary scout and showman, portrayed as a hero who respects Native Americans but is caught in the march of progress.
filmography.plot: The life of Buffalo Bill Cody, from his days as an Army scout to his success with his Wild West Show.

filmography.title: The Great Moment
filmography.role_description: A dedicated dentist who discovers ether anesthesia but faces ridicule and poverty instead of acclaim.
filmography.plot: A biography of the dentist who discovered the use of ether for anesthesia, told with a mix of drama and comedy.

filmography.title: The Virginian
filmography.role_description: A stoic ranch foreman who must hang his best friend for cattle rustling and woo a schoolteacher from the East.
filmography.plot: A good-natured cowboy courts a schoolteacher and faces a moral dilemma when his friend turns to cattle rustling.

filmography.title: Ramrod
filmography.role_description: A tough ranch hand who becomes the foreman for a headstrong woman fighting a range war against her father and a powerful cattle baron.
filmography.plot: A woman inherits a ranch and hires a recovering alcoholic as her foreman to fight a powerful cattle baron.

filmography.title: Four Faces West
filmography.role_description: A bank robber who turns out to be a decent man, helping a sick family while being pursued by Pat Garrett.
filmography.plot: A cowboy robs a bank to save his father's ranch but stops to help a sick Mexican family while fleeing the law.

filmography.title: South of St. Louis
filmography.role_description: A rancher who gets involved in gun-running during the Civil War after his ranch is destroyed.
filmography.plot: Three ranch partners are scattered by the Civil War; one joins the Confederates, while the others become gunrunners.

filmography.title: Colorado Territory
filmography.role_description: An escaped outlaw who tries to pull one last job before retiring, in this Western remake of 'High Sierra'.
filmography.plot: An outlaw breaks out of jail to pull one last train robbery, but is betrayed by his partners and hunted by the law.

filmography.title: Stars in My Crown
filmography.role_description: A gentle but firm parson in the post-Civil War South who uses his faith and two pistols to bring peace to his town.
filmography.plot: A Civil War veteran becomes a preacher in a small town and deals with a typhoid epidemic and racial prejudice.

filmography.title: Cattle Drive
filmography.role_description: A patient trail boss who takes a spoiled rich kid under his wing and teaches him responsibility on a cattle drive.
filmography.plot: A spoiled rich kid gets lost in the desert and is picked up by a cattle drive, where he learns hard work and humility.

filmography.title: Wichita
filmography.role_description: A reluctant lawman who cleans up a lawless cattle town, portrayed with McCrea's signature stoicism.
filmography.plot: Wyatt Earp agrees to become the marshal of lawless Wichita, Kansas, but his strict enforcement of the law angers the town leaders.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Win – Best Outdoor Drama

filmography.title: The Gunfight at Dodge City
filmography.role_description: The famous lawman who runs for sheriff to avenge his brother's death and clean up a corrupt town.
filmography.plot: Bat Masterson takes over as sheriff of Dodge City to find his brother's killer and restore order.

filmography.title: Ride the High Country
filmography.role_description: An aging, principled ex-lawman hired to transport gold who must confront his old partner's lack of integrity.
filmography.plot: Two aging lawmen are hired to guard a gold shipment, but one plans to steal it, leading to a final confrontation of morals.
